entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 10:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -21.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
